service.name: pshb
service.description: PubSubHubBub notifier wich sends a new content notification request to an hub
service.author: Christoph Kappestein <k42b3.x@gmail.com>

database.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.pshb_subscription}` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `status` INT(10) NOT NULL, `hub` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `topic` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `leaseSeconds` INT(10), `secret` VARCHAR(40), `verifyToken` VARCHAR(32), `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
